name: Wrenched: The Last Mechanic - v0.01 Demo
name_original: Wrenched: The Last Mechanic - v0.01 Demo
description:
A few months ago I decided it was time to learn how to code. To do so I started making "Junkworld", a 3d action platformer. Since I started development, Junkworld went through a few major changes and in it's current state, I would describe it as a "3d Bullet Hell Action Platformer".

In a way I am making this game for myself; to learn how to program and make games by myself. But I would be lying if I said I wouldn't want Junkworld to be played, loved and enjoyed by as much players as possible.

That is where this demo comes in. Junkworld, and this demo, in it's current state are far, far, far, far from finished. But this demo should give a pretty good impression of the main game loop.

I would love for you to play this demo and let me know what you think. You can do so by commenting on this page or joining our discord server and commenting your feedback in the idea-and-feedback channel.
Join Our Discord

Wait... is it called Junkworld or Wrenched?

When I started development I named the game Junkworld. This has always been a working title, and it seems a hand full of other games are also named "Junkworld". However I still refer to is as such in my devlogs, for recognition sake. However I have been playing around with some new names, and as this day forward the new working title will be "Wrenched".

Want to know more about the Development?

If you want to know more about the development of the project I have been recording devlogs and documenting every step.
